Text:
Installation Instructions :

1. Install The Application.

2. After Installation, Do Not Run It.

3. Start "Registry Booster" From The Installation Directory Or Goto Run & Type -

"C:\Program Files (x86)\Uniblue\RegistryBooster\registrybooster.exe" For 64-Bit Windows &

"C:\Program Files\Uniblue\RegistryBooster\registrybooster.exe" For 32-Bit Windows To Start "Registry Booster".

4. After Srarting "Registry Booster" It Will Start Scan, Stop It, Close The Windows & Exit "Registry Booster" From The System Tray.

5. Start Registry Editor "As Administrator"

6. Goto "Edit" - "Find"....Mark All The Check-Boxes Including "Match Whole String Only".

7. Type FC In The Search Box & Start Search.

8. When It Finds A Key, Right Click On The Key (On The Right Side Of The Regedit Window) & Select "New" - "String". Name It "License". Now Double Click On The "License" & Set The "Value Data" To "PS-ZMYAQ-N6SNK-J9BD6-53HZF-LV833-UW27K ".

Always Avoid The "". It's For Marking Purpose Only....

Is there any way around using this program with ESET NOD32? It doesn't work with it. When i install it terminates!? And yes i temporarily disabled the antivirus. A window pops up and says it found ESET NOD32 and the program cant run with it..
perfect as usual keep up the great work

Guys, you don't need a firewall for this. Just add this to your HOSTS File

127.0.0.1 activate.uniblue.com

You can get the HOSTS file via this directory: 
C:\Windows\System32\Drivers\ETC\HOSTS

How To Open Registry Editor
1)Click And Hold The Windows icon button on your keyboard and click R
2)Type in "regedit" And Click Enter

Hey guys, IK this is currently working but like most programs this connects to the internet to validate the serial at random times. I found this in the old 2010 version btw. To fix this you need to add this entry into your HOSTS file:

127.0.0.1 activate.uniblue.com



To mod your host file open notepad.exe(Right click and select "Run as Administrator" Vista/7) then browse for the file HOSTS in "C:\Windows\System32\Drivers\ETC" and add the above entry then hit save. Now your copy should not get deactivated in an event that uniblue blocks the serial.

This generates a Product ID 
(PS-E9J3T-HHJSM-PV3RM-REXGT-EPJK4-PBTF4)  and is the only one you get when clicking the Serial but can't use it, says invalid ID. So at this time I find this program usless till I can find a new ID Code.
